paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to show that the normalizing rank aggregation method can not only be used to derive the priority vector for a Multiplicative preference relation, but also for the additive transitive fuzzy preference relation. To do so, a simple functional equation between fuzzy preference's element and priority weight is derived firstly, then, based on the equation, three methods are proposed to prove that the normalizing rank aggregation method is simple and effective for deriving the priority vector. Finally, a numerical example is used to illustrate the proposed methods. Crown Copyright (C) 2009 Published by Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Normalizing rank aggregation method for priority of a fuzzy preference relation and its effectiveness
